title: On The Way to Black Rock City
name: On The Way to Black Rock City
description:
A Map by Nym

Favorite places to go to around or on the way to Burning Man's Black Rock City. Please add the places that are significant to you so others can benefit!

properties.name: Black Rock Hot Springs
properties.description: Posted by Sandenni Black Rock Hot Springs

properties.name: Butte Springs (Trego Hot Springs), NV
properties.description: Posted by CrschmidtHot spring, temperature: 187 degress F, 86 degress C

properties.name: Caine Spring, NV
properties.description: Posted by CrschmidtHot spring, temperature: 73 degress F, 23 degress C

properties.name: Campbell Hot Springs, CA
properties.description: Posted by CrschmidtHot spring, temperature: 111 degress F, 44 degress C

properties.name: China Diner
properties.description: Posted by Nym 275 West St, Reno, NVLate night chinese!

properties.name: Da Man
properties.description: Posted by Nym 40.754786911, -119.236402821The location of "The Man", a anually reoccuring wooden effigy that gets burned to the ground. Note: This is an EXACT location, which is used to create the entire city from.

properties.name: Double Hot Springs, NV
properties.description: Posted by CrschmidtHot spring, temperature: 178 degress F, 81 degress C

properties.name: Empire Branch
properties.description: Posted by WpfanThe 7-mile long Empire Branch was operated by US Gypsum, and served a production facility.

properties.name: FLy Ranch (Wards) Hot Springs, NV
properties.description: Posted by CrschmidtHot spring, temperature: 180 degress F, 82 degress C

properties.name: Fantasy Girls
properties.description: Posted by Nym 1095 East Fourth, Reno NVAnother strip club. No idea what this one is like. I\'m probably the wrong person to be adding strip clubs to this map, I\'ve never been to one.. ever.

properties.name: Great Boiling Spring (Gerlach), NV
properties.description: Posted by CrschmidtHot spring, temperature: 208 degress F, 98 degress C

properties.name: Home Depot
properties.description: Posted by Nym2955 Northtowne LN, Reno, NV 89512Good place to get those last minute supplies. Home depot would sponsor Burning Man probably if they could.

properties.name: Home Depot
properties.description: Posted by Nym5125 Summit Ridge CT, Reno, NV 89523Not so close, but another Home Depot to get those last minute things. .o0 ( Damn, I almost forgot the 40 2x4\'s that I was supposed to get! )

properties.name: Java Jungle
properties.description: Posted by Nym 246 W 1st St, Reno, NV"Coffee isn\'t bad. Down by the water". Supposedly a great place to hang out.

properties.name: Mel's Diner
properties.description: Posted by Nym 345 N. Arlington, Reno, NV I don\'t know why, but I just love eating diner food before hitting Black Rock City. I tend to get better food on the playa though, but there\'s more 50\'s memorbilia here at Mel\'s!

properties.name: Mud Springs, NV
properties.description: Posted by CrschmidtHot spring, temperature: 184 degress F, 84 degress C

properties.name: Springs, NV
properties.description: Posted by CrschmidtHot spring, temperature: 84 degress F, 29 degress C

properties.name: The Melting Pot
properties.description: Posted by Nym 888 South Virginia, Reno, NVDidn\'t get enough hippy supplies from your last Rainbow gathering? Need more for the burn? Hoping to bother burners with a new drum, digeridoo, or finger cymbals? Maybe you just need to get your stink on with some patchouli oil.... Hours: Mon-Sat 10AM-7PM, Sun 11AM-6PM.

properties.name: The Men's Club
properties.description: Posted by Nym 270 Lake Street, Reno, NVStrip club for... yuppers, men.

properties.name: The Spice House
properties.description: Posted by Nym 310 Spokane, Reno NVStrip Club... with spicyness!

properties.name: WARC - Thrift Store
properties.description: Posted by Nym  406 Pyramid Way, Reno, NVWARC is a non-profit that serves people with developmental disabilities in the Reno area. They own and operate 4 thrift stores. Their Pyramid Store is right on (right on!) the way. They have been collecting bikes, camping gear and other sundries for our pleasure.

properties.name: WARC - Thrift Store
properties.description: Posted by Nym  790 Sutro Street, Reno, NVWARC is a non-profit that serves people with developmental disabilities in the Reno area. They own and operate 4 thrift stores. They have been collecting bikes, camping gear and other sundries for our pleasure.
